alert.note: Alert for Cooper; Saline (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 04 at 4:16AM CDT until August 05 at 1:50PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill MO has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Missouri... Blackwater River near Blue Lick affecting Cooper and Saline Counties. This product along with additional weather and stream information is available at www.weather.gov/kc/. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Blackwater River near Blue Lick. * WHEN...From this morning to early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Cropland and pastures along the river flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:45 AM CDT Friday the stage was 10.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this morning to a crest of 26.6 feet late this morning. It will then fall below flood stage this afternoon. - Flood stage is 24.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
